text: Dr B. R. Ambedkar Medical College is a medical college and hospital in Kadugondanahalli, Bangalore, India, affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences, Bangalore. The college was established in 1981. This Medical College is run by Anandaa Social and Educational trust in Bangalore. == Courses == * MBBS * MD General Medicine * MD Obstetrics ^ MS ENT * MD Pathology == References == ==External links== * Official Website Category:Colleges affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences Category:B. R. Ambedkar
title: Dr. B. R. Ambedkar Medical College
